name: Minigame Compilation
description:
This is a compilation of mini games made with Godot to practice and finish a lot of little projects with the most amount of polish possible.

Not a gamejam, just a personal thing.

Minigames in the game: [X] Finished [O] Not Started

  •  Rock, Paper, Scissors [X]
  • Tic Tac Toe [O]
  • Minesweeper [X]
  • Sudoku [O]
  • Dice [O]
  • Coin Flip [O]
